settings.heading: About Us
settings.description: L.A. Girl Cosmetics is all about bringing artistry to life by providing prestige-quality color cosmetics to all makeup users alike - from the savvy beauty junkie to the inspired novice.

settings.heading: Love Inspiring Beauty
settings.description: As an affordable luxury cosmetics brand, L.A. Girl Cosmetics loves to INSPIRE beauty by creating new ways to ignite individual expression thru the art of color. We’re a chic and savvy professional makeup brand that places the power of artistry in the hands of today’s aspiring makeup user.

settings.heading: Beauty for All
settings.description: L.A. Girl Cosmetics has taken pride in offering on-trend, innovative, and exceptional quality products. With an amazing selection of high-quality cosmetic products that cater to makeup enthusiasts all over the world, L.A. Girl has become a destination brand that offers beauty without compromise.

settings.title: #LAGIRLCOSMETICS
settings.description: Show us your looks and tag @lagirlcosmetics #lagirlcosmetics for a chance to be featured!
